concept.title: List Prop
concept.shortdesc: A list prop is a traffic variable that can accept multiple values at once. A delimited list of values is passed into the variable, then reported as individual line items. List props are most commonly implemented on pages that contain user-selectable values, such as listed items with check boxes or radio buttons. They are useful in any circumstance where you want to define multiple values in a variable without sending multiple image requests.
